titleStmt.title: The laws of paradise, given forth by wisdom to a translated spirit.
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by T. Sowle, near the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street,

notesStmt.note: Bound and filmed after Wing P72, J.W.P. A letter to some divines.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Meeting-house in White-Hart-Court in Gracious-Street
